QuestData.Title: Revered Among Thrallmar
QuestData.Description: You've proven yourself time and again, $c. Yet more trials await you.$B$BContinue to fight the Fel Horde inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel and your name will be known to all of Thrall's followers in this land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nazgrel at Thrallmar in Hellfire Peninsula wants you to become revered with Thrallmar by fighting the Fel Orcs inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
